explains: v. 伪造（forge 的过去式）；锻造（金属）

sentences.en: Someone had forged her signature on the cheque.
sentences.cn: 有人在支票上伪造了她的签名。

sentences.en: They used forged documents to leave the country.
sentences.cn: 他们利用伪造的文件离开了这个国家。

sentences.en: A number of forged tickets are in circulation.
sentences.cn: 有一些假入场券在流通。
